description: My mom wrote a cookbook of recipes from my youth, and gave each of us kids a copy when we went off to college. This skill looks up the recipes by keyword, and presents them as a card in the Alexa companion app. Reproduced with permission.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Mom's Cooking for cookies.
Alexa, ask Mom's Cooking the recipe for chili.
Alexa, ask Mom's Cooking how to make beef stroganoff.
name: Mom's Cooking
shortDescription: Shows recipes from "Mom's Cooking," a cookbook that a mother wrote for her children.
